attributes.action: Stop the Public Duties Cost Allowance paid to ex Prime Ministers
attributes.additional_details: In these times of financial hardship, and costcutting, I feel it is wrong to pay ex British Prime Ministers such an allowance when they are no longer in government positions. These people are clearly not in hardship, and an example should be set to the British people that government are willing to cut costs to ex ministers as well as the ordinary working man/woman.
